title: Watering Tips
description: Water your plants deeply but less often. Allow the top inch of soil to dry out before watering again to prevent root rot.

title: Sunlight Tips
description: Most indoor plants prefer bright, indirect sunlight. Keep them near a window but avoid direct harsh rays.
